NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

ErrorPage.title: Something went wrong!
ErrorPage.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

ActiveBookingAlert.info: Ends on {expiryDate, date, ::E dd MMMM hhmm}

UnauthenticatedAlert.description: You must be logged in to reserve a parking space.

Calendar.noEvents: No active bookings for this day
Calendar.dateRange: {startDate, date, ::dd MMM hhmm} - {endDate, date, ::dd MMM hhmm}

cancelModal.title: Are you sure?
cancelModal.description: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?

title.label: Title
title.placeholder: Write a title for the reservation
title.description: The title is used to identify the reservation.

errors.minLength: The title must have at least {amount} characters.

duration.description: For more options, click on the calendar icon

createBooking.title: Booking confirmed
createBooking.shortDescription: You have a parking space reserved until <time>{endDate, time, ::HH:mm}</time> hours.
createBooking.description: You have reserved parking space from <from>{startDate, date, ::dd MMMM hhmm}</from> until <to>{endDate, date, ::dd MMMM hhmm}</to>.

missingTitle.title: Fields required
missingTitle.description: The reservation must have a title. Please provide the required field and try again.

createBooking.title: Something went wrong!
createBooking.description: We couldn't create the booking. Please try again later.

cancelBooking.title: Something went wrong!
cancelBooking.description: We couldn't cancel the booking. Please try again later.

fetchActiveBooking.title: Something went wrong!
fetchActiveBooking.description: We couldn't get the active booking. Please try again later.
